p: As such, this has inspired many studies of the medicinal plant eucalyptus. For example, studies have noted the high efficiency of Eucalyptus globulus essential oil and 1,8-cineole against the development of biofilms formed by methicillin-resistant strains of bacteria [ 12]. Nonetheless, the biological effects of the active compounds of the various vegetative parts of eucalyptus have not been studied. Moreover, it is also necessary to study the effect of individual compounds of herbal extracts on poultry. Recent studies have shown that Î±-Pinene can modulate quorum sensitivity, potentiate antibiotics, and reduce Campylobacter colonization in broiler chickens [ 13].
